normalized: 6 hours ago.
280 kilometres north-west from the encounter point of the die erde fleet and the kushan fleet――
the shadowy silhouettes of mobile units appeared in the jet black sand sea.
it was the augusta battalion comprised of 80 battle-mounts, launched from the die erde fleet.
they had set up 16 v-shaped formations comprised of 5 battle-mounts each with its wings projecting forward, the so-called crane wing formation, and were advancing.
they were moving through the sand sea as it slid underneath them, and looked like giants who had placed their torsos on the base of a tripod.
a periscope was surveying all this from deep within the sand.

name: bouroux
normalized: miss, the enemy’s task force has been discovered on the course as expected.
this is perfect.
an old man, who had the looks reminiscent of a hero from the medieval times, said so cheerfully.
colonel armand bouroux.
he was the captain of the kushan armed forces’s new weapon, the sand sea type super high-speed submarine, race.
he was the most experienced officer of the kushan armed forces.
he had been personally appointed by beatrice to be the guardian of her daughter, kila, similar to other older people of his ilk.

name: kila
normalized: perhaps, the enemy had knowledge about the dispatch of our cavalry unit, however… fufufu… the speed of our advance has definitely not been measured♪
kila kushan replied to him, as he stood on the bridge-deck.
she was in the cockpit of the new sand sea armoured-mount, excelsior, which was docked to the high-speed submarine race.
regardless of that, a radiant smile was etched onto her face.
a smile―― which was very sharp.

name: bouroux
normalized: it was good that this sand sea type ultra-high-speed submarine, <race>, was ready in time for the war against the die erde army, miss.

name: kila
normalized: it is still too early to rejoice.
i don’t think mother will want to lose to the enemy’s fleet, even though it is twice as large as ours.

name: bouroux
normalized: i know that very well!
we will destroy the enemy’s new modelled force quickly, before rushing in with a pointed ambush of our own on the enemy’s fleet.

name: kila
normalized: yes, armand.
timing is key♪
bouroux was addressing kila as “miss” and kila replied back, by referring to him by his first name “armand”.
although, kila was the daughter of the commodore beatrice, who was the supreme commander, it wasn’t in accordance to the protocols within an organization like the army.
far from blaming kila for calling him by his first name, bouroux looked at her with proud eyes, having developed an intimate bond with her.
there was a reason why it was said that, 『the fate of the kushan armed forces rests on the shoulders of the lady and the lass』.
and so, the old man was advising the young girl directly, with a face which showed that he was neither taking such things to heart, nor paying mind to her trivial silliness.

name: bouroux
normalized: the ability of the enemy hasn’t yet been measured, miss.
don’t be negligent.

name: kila
normalized: they won’t be able to demonstrate their abilities until we engage them.
kila said so, before nimbly pushing in the departure sequence.

name: bouroux
normalized: may the warrior’s fortune be with you.

name: kila
normalized: heavy armour excelsior, deploying!
zoosh!
the sandy surface cracked heavily.
and it burst out from the sand all of a sudden, blowing up sand similar to a water-fountain.
a distinctive silhouette with both shoulders spread wide, emerged in the night sky.
kila was driving the excelsior.

name: kila
normalized: pain!
her eyes sparkled.
she moved her hand skilfully, which was holding the control stick.
her targets were locked on.
8 small anti-ship jet-missiles,
all were fired!
boom!
eight explosions spread out over the jet black sand sea.
all were perfect strikes.
all the targeted mounts of the augusta battalion turned into scraps of iron, in an instant.
they had been caught off guard and the weakness of their armour was, now, exposed.

name: kila
normalized: it is a new model!
looks like their armour is made of paper.
kila smiled fearlessly, and stepped hard on the foot pedal.
the thrusters of the excelsior fired off with a roar.
she plunged right into the core of the augusta battalion without hesitation, even though it still had 72 battle-mounts left.

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: how did the enemy get here!?

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: i-it is massive!

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: what the hell is that!?
does the enemy have a new model!?

name: kila
normalized: such dull reactions!

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: this is 30 kilometres north of the calculated sand zone, isn’t it!?
is this new model capable of travelling so fast…?
tch!

name: kila
normalized: have made you slow!

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: uwaah!
the fact that 8 battle-mounts had suddenly been shot down in an ambush, caused the soldiers of the augusta battalion to fall into an extreme panic.
they couldn’t deal with this unexpected turn of events, and two more mounts were shot down, followed by one more.

name: mecklinger
normalized: the opponent may be massive, but it is only one armoured-mount!
even though it is a new model, the augusta’s firepower has been specially designed to deal with the sand sea armoured-mounts!

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: y-yes!

name: mecklinger
normalized: besiege it securely, and bring it down!

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: roger that!
mecklinger was truly a veteran war hero.
he attempted to lead his floundering charges by inspiring them, without being distracted at the unexpected ambush.

it seemed like the calm demeanour of the brigadier-general was working, as the soldiers of the augusta battalion regained their poise and dispatched a number of their troops towards kila, and she was trapped within their siege.

name: kila
normalized: their commander isn’t a fool.
even though she had destroyed more than ten of their battle-mounts, the enemy was still a massive group.
however, despite being surrounded by them, kila wasn’t even remotely shaken.

name: mecklinger
normalized: i will draw the attention of the enemy!
deploy the bombs and blow a hole in the flank of that massive thing!
mecklinger plunged himself towards the enemy, just as the siege enclosure shut completely.

name: kila
normalized: hah!
did you think i would be deceived by such a manoeuvre!?
wisely, kila didn’t commit to battle with the onrushing machine.
on the contrary, she moved organically around the enemy in order to confuse the surrounding troops, as he tried to move in a coordinated pattern while acting as a decoy.

considering that she was outnumbered, she moved skilfully, sliding in and out of the line of sight of the surrounding enemy units so that if they did attack her, they would end up slaughtering each other.
the excelsior’s big frame was being driven brilliantly, even though it was twice the size of the augusta.
its splendidly flowing movement looked like a brilliant dance being performed by a giant on the sandy stage.
obviously, the soldiers of the augusta were unable to take any actions and started to panic yet again.

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: w-what is this thing!?
what a monster!

name: mecklinger
normalized: don’t shoot!
you will end up shooting each other!
by the time mecklinger realized his soldiers’ intentions, it was already too late.
the excelsior danced nimbly, one step at a time, around the augusta, as a diaspora of explosions engulfed their surroundings.

name: mecklinger
normalized: this movement… the famed practice of the grim reaper, huh?

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『this new model!
is it being operated by the ace of the kushan armed forces, kila kushan!?
mecklinger turned on the communications-line and called out to his opponent.
it looked like blood had rushed into the head of the ace-pilot, on having come up against a formidable opponent.

name: kila
normalized: 『so, are you their commander?
name yourself.
kila gave him a similarly pointed response,
as they continued their fierce battle with each other.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『mecklinger, brigadier-general emmerich mecklinger.

name: kila
normalized: 『fufufu… cordelia’s wolf on the martian surface?

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『it is an honour to meet the grim reaper of the sand sea.
ladies first is my creed.
i will banish you to the netherworld of the sand very soon.

name: kila
normalized: 『ladies first？
don’t make me laugh, you perverted homo-sexual bastard.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『still… it is extremely uncultured for a woman to enter the battlefield, miss.
i will banish you, along with your mother.

name: kila
normalized: 『keep on prattling!
they didn’t retreat from each other.
both put their lives on the line and continued to shoot, while abusing each other.
after tens of seconds, their bout was complete.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『of course, blood is likely to rise to your head immediately, especially since you are a woman.
mecklinger confirmed that his subordinates had positioned themselves on the flanks,
and on his next attack, he feinted quickly and raced to her backside, putting considerable distance between them.

name: kila
normalized: 『brisk!
kila opened up her thrusters fully.
she went into overdrive and chased after the fleeing mecklinger.
the black battle-mount raced like a meteor over the sand sea.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『now!
mecklinger’s men were waiting for that straight-line movement.
the firepower of dozens of battle-mounts of the augusta battalion converged.
the excelsior was enveloped in a tremendous explosion, due to the attack that was done from all sides.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『farewell, miss!
cordelia’s wolf said brazenly.
however――
as the smoke of the explosion slowly cleared,
the still-intact frame of the excelsior appeared.

name: kila
normalized: 『un-for-tu-nate.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『r-ridiculous!?
even the main-cannon firepower of the augusta’s battle-mounts couldn’t get through that!?
unable to hide it, a look of astonishment spread over mecklinger’s face, even though he was someone who bore great pride in possessing an orderly appearance.

name: kila
normalized: 『kukuku… did you really think you had caught me in your trap?
a distortion occurred in the air around the excelsior, and little sparks of lightning ran across it.
an invisible field was enveloping the battle-mount.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『a sh-shield weapon!?
how!?

name: kila
normalized: 『the shield is down to 20%.
surprisingly, your firepower is equivalent in its potency to the sand sea armoured-mounts of “the dreadnought”.
even though she was extremely surprised, kila was grinning with a fearless smile etched across her face.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『kuuh!?
mecklinger clenched his teeth.

name: kila
normalized: 『cordelia’s wolf, do you really think you have the time to hesitate?

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『fuh… well, you seem to be quite proud of that shield, however――』
mecklinger was trying to regain his composure.
however, his words were interrupted midway.
beep!

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『what!?
warning beeps reflected across the control-panel of mecklinger’s battle-mount.
no, not just his.
most of his battalion’s mounts were beeping.
it was a lock-on warning.

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: 『there are numerous metal reactions in the sand!?

name: augusta soldiers
normalized: 『m-missiles!

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『all units, use evasive manoeuvres at once!
mecklinger screamed at his subordinates, while also acting on his own in order to avoid the incoming missiles.
a group of missiles burst out from the sand.
they were a tremendous number.

name: mecklinger
normalized: (were there other submarines in the sand, besides hers!?
however, not only did the missiles approach.
the sandy surface itself blew up, as if a volcano had erupted.
the armoured-mounts of “the dreadnought”, along with the intact sand sea armoured cavalry unit of the kushan fleet, all came forth together.
a total of 30 battle-mounts.
the missile-attack had been a decoy as well.
just as the formation of the augusta battalion collapsed to avoid them,
as if having been waiting for it in the dark depths of the sand, the troops of the dreadnought surfaced and brought forth their ambush.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『their armoured cavalry unit is all over us!?
how is this possible!?
a flash of explosions lit up in a sequence.

name: mecklinger
normalized: 『was their pace more than what we had measured!?
the good-looking man’s mask of composure had completely collapsed by now.
the reason why the die erde faction was able to continue the excellent advance of its irresistible forces in outer space――

was because of the tactical deployment of the chinook assault-esque transport-ships, as a means to compensate for cruising long distances at high speeds, which was one of the major weaknesses of the armoured-knights,
in the sand sea of mars, mecklinger had underestimated the possibility that the enemy could have methods to realize a similar means of transport.
it had left him knocking on the doors of the netherworld.

name: kila
normalized: 『farewell, brigadier-general.
he heard the voice of the grim reaper of the sand sea over the death throes of his subordinates.
her cold voice was well-suited for both her personas.
at that very moment,
kila’s single sniping strike blew up the body of mecklinger’s battle-mount into numerous pieces.
although, mecklinger had successfully managed to avoid the missile-attack, as well as the ambush of the dreadnought,
kila was never going to miss this critical opportunity.
and then――
10 battle-mounts had been caught in the decoy missile-attack,
more than 28 battle-mounts were demolished or shot down in the subsequent fierce assault of the dreadnought.
in a few hours, the augusta battalion lost its general with more than half of its forces, and was completely thrown out of the battle.
now, all they had to do was wait and hunt down the remainder.
